attributes.action: Extend school days by 1.2h for a Friday to be a day off
attributes.additional_details: We need an extra day off
attributes.background: Make school days longer by 1 hour and 20 minutes just for a Friday to be a day off

rejection.details:
We understand you would like the school day to be extended and for schools to be closed on Fridays. However the hours a school is open is left up to individual schools to decide - the Government simply sets a minimum number of days per year schools are required to be open. This means the Government doesn't decide when in the day that a school must open and close.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614046
